quiz.question: What is Nuxt.js primarily used for?
options: Building server-side rendered applications using Vue.js
quiz.hint: It is a framework for Vue.js.

quiz.question: Which of the following is a key feature of Nuxt.js?
quiz.hint: This feature optimizes performance by rendering HTML on the server.

quiz.question: Why might a developer choose Nuxt.js over Next.js?
quiz.hint: Consider the base JavaScript framework each uses.

quiz.question: What is the primary language used for developing applications in Nuxt.js?
quiz.hint: Nuxt.js is built on top of Vue.js.

quiz.question: Which architectural pattern does Nuxt.js support out of the box?
